title: Every time i try to launch league i get a RADS Error(Please help me, i have tried most things)
body: Ummm, after i downloaded aviva antivirus, my league was still working then when i deleted it my league stopped working and i have tried reseting router, changing the internet thing to 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 and ive tried flushing the dns and running as admin. Then when i reinstalled i get the same error...  Please help me someone                  Im tired... :(

replies.body:
Try and launch the client as admin:

1. Right click on client
2. Run as Admin

This RADS Error can happen if a security setting is blocking you from launching the client.  You've taken some solid steps so far, but I suggest going through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
